Working, needs cleanup. Liscence check.
Update README.md
Initial commit
Added more usertracker data: isVisible, average confidence, joint pos/rot confience
Fixed some compiler warnings.
Fixed bUseCalibratedRGBDepth not initialized.
Moved getUserData() in header
Fixed color image not updating.

Added getUserData()

UserData access function to allow apps to process skeleton, forgot this in last PR. :)
Update README.md
Updated example-simple to use to new interface.
Fixed debugString for usertracker.
Added user map image and skeleton overlay drawing.
Added coordinate tranform functions from openni.
oniContext and generators do not need to be static.
Misc. cleanups: open(), close(), enableRGBDepth(), draw functions, unused variables
Cleared up unused textures/images. Refactor "video" -> "color" when referring to the RGB/color image.
Cleaned up the system of bools. Optional features should now be enabled/disabled before init
Cleaned up initialization and return code checking code.
Refactor "globals" g_... to oni..., as they are now members.
Implemented updateUserTracker, adding UserData struct and ofPixels userMap.
Removed fields g_bNeedPose and g_strPose. Now checks NeedPose == false in init.
Removed some unused variables and code. Disabled skeleton drawing as of now, will update/draw functions for this later.
Removed back buffers. I see no need for threading atm.

Rewrote callback functions to use non-static member functions.

Also added ofEvents for new/lost user. Removed pose detection.

rewrote calculateMaps into updateDepth, updateColor, updateUserTracker.

Also, fixed bug where colorized image was not allocated as 3-channel
Formatting: draw...() functions to oneliners in header.
Removed threading for now, as it was only waiting for new frames.

Removed dependence on XML file.

Will remove commented out code when the segfault is fixed.
Moved global variables/callbacks into ofxONI1_5 as static members.
ran of/scripts/dev/style/styleAddon
